ai-mil7.6.7:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the two fingernails that he has been bullocked by the eighty-footed? What is its shell?”
ai-mil7.6.7:1.2_0: “Great king, after entering the house on the top of the Buddha, and entering the house where he was gone out.
ai-mil7.6.7:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, when you’ve entered the village for alms, after walking for alms in the village for alms, he shouldn’t be able to get out of that assumed.
ai-mil7.6.7:1.4_0: This is the first top of the fingerbreadth.
ai-mil7.6.7:2.1_0: Furthermore, a deer doesn’t maintain their applies to others.
ai-mil7.6.7:2.2_0: In the same way, when one of good conduct goes to those families and decaying themselves with a warrior-noble married, embarrassed, or specifically for their physical pain—sharp, severe, unpleasant, disagreeable, and blameworthy.
ai-mil7.6.7:2.3_0: This is the second great king.
ai-mil7.6.7:2.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the Majesty’s marks:
ai-mil7.6.7:3.1_0: ‘The Buddha has laid down for himself in the virtue of learning.
ai-mil7.6.7:3.2_0: in faith, ethics, learning, and intelligence,
ai-mil7.6.7:3.3_0: in generosity, teachings, and much good else,
ai-mil7.6.7:3.4_0: in coin and corn, fields and lands,
ai-mil7.6.7:4.3_0: he doesn’t want to enter the monastery,
ai-mil7.6.7:4.4_0: what is beneficial and good fortune?’”
ai-mil7.6.7:5.1_0: The seventh Questions are the seventh section.
